subject: [Mhln] What is an OEM and which is better to buy?
body:
Ideas must work through the brains and the arms of good and brave men, or they are no better than dreams.

The hottest place in Hell is reserved for those who remain neutral in times of great moral conflict.

To a well deserving person God will show favor. To an ill deserving person He will simply be just.

Democracy is the menopause of Western society, the Grand Climacteric of the body social. Fascism is its middle-aged lust.

The man who suspects his own tediousness is yet to be born.

As favor and riches forsake a man, we discover in him the foolishness they concealed, and which no one perceived before.

The newest books are those that never grow old.

Man is the only animal that blushes -- or needs to.

Oh, write of me, not ''Died in bitter pains,'' but ''Emigrated to another star!''

Every library should try to be complete on something, if it were only the history of pinheads.

Heroism is not only in the man, but in the occasion.

Life is the flower for which love is the honey.

I think we now come to the park expecting to win instead of playing not to lose.
